summary: One Handed and Archery Standalone Follower

[font=Georgia]Thanks for upload Yunsol introduction videos!
[/font][b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#1e84cc][size=6]
[b][size=6][b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#1e84cc][size=6][youtube]EHi4pHuVWz8[/youtube][/size][/color][/font][/b][/size][/b]
[youtube]wTAC1r5-ngc[/youtube][youtube]vRX2COB2jWQ[/youtube]
CanCho Yunsol Follower[/size][/color][/font][/b][/center][/size][/b][center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#1e84cc][size=4]Everything about mod is in the above images and video,
[/size][/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#1e84cc][size=4]But i will give you more explanation about one thing.[/size][/color][/font]

[color=#38761d][size=4]First, I say sorry to you for my lack of English speaking skill. 
[/size][/color][size=4]
[/size][size=4]Hello, I'm EOMSIC.[/size]
Thank you for coming to see my mod!
This is my first Skyrim mod, 
also it is the first Skyrim follower mod.

Yunsol has HDT Hair wig.
Problem is due to the chronic problem of HDT,
When done fast travel or moving to another area,
She may be invisible.

Solution is to take her wig off or
Use optional Non HDTHair .esp Plugin file. (<- on "Option/Non HDTHair" Folder)

That's it.
As i said, Everything about mod is in the above images and video.

I plan to make Korean voices, and I hope you have many expectations.[/size][/color][/font]

Last Thing, i'm doing some game streaming on Twitch.
